DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multicenter phase II study evaluate safety efficacy onartuzumab combination bevacizumab compare bevacizumab alone participant recurrent glioblastoma . Participants randomize 1:1 receive either placebo plus bevacizumab every 3 week , onartuzumab plus bevacizumab . Study treatment continue disease progression , unacceptable toxicity , participant physician decision discontinue , death .
